This page lists all the '''client-side''' scripting classes that are implemented in the 1.4 version of Multi Theft Auto. It mirrors the procedural [[/Client_Scripting_Functions.md|client functions]]. For information on how to enable OOP in 1.4 please refer to [[/Meta.xml.md|Meta.xml]].

Classes can be instantiated by either calling the '''create''' method, when applicable, or by calling the class. For example: ''Vehicle(...)'' is the same as ''Vehicle.create(...)''.

Here is a list of all the current classes (nested classes are subclasses):
